title: Lupin III: Mine Fujiko to Iu Onna
alternative_title: Lupin the Third, The Woman Called Fujiko Mine, LUPIN the Third ～峰不二子という女～
description: Many people are falling prey to a suspicious new religion. Lupin III infiltrates this group, hoping to steal the treasure their leader keeps hidden. There he lays eyes on the beautiful, bewitching woman who has the leader enthralled. This is the story of how fashionable female thief Fumiko Mine first met Lupin III, the greatest theif of his generation.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Samurai>, <Genre -> Seinen>]
